# UTF8 Counter

Calculate how many possible UTF8 strings there are.

## Examples

UTF-8 strings of a single byte:

```console
> cargo run --quiet --release -- 1
128
```

UTF-8 strings of 2 bytes:

```console
> cargo run --quiet --release -- 2
18_304
```

UTF-8 strings of 10 bytes:

```console
> cargo run --quiet --release -- 10
3_498_720_990_639_933_095_936
```

UTF-8 strings of 1000 bytes:

```console
> cargo run --quiet --release -- 1000
1_034_238_585_052_186_242_965_265_125_473_978_365_191_986_563_938_972_407_359_985_039_440_328_561_293_773_572_426_829_171_596_455_068_755_817_137_865_184_688_318_497_814_748_580_167_147_323_836_440_905_818_857_663_747_168_671_905_915_591_355_085_840_983_298_271_807_998_537_620_952_351_255_485_553_370_022_976_100_589_906_279_060_177_971_275_868_908_839_878_082_099_899_454_583_210_558_051_907_325_886_390_970_233_725_682_629_762_117_615_482_937_759_461_486_926_220_894_437_646_471_269_371_847_698_943_058_975_944_110_045_614_176_229_723_336_086_607_442_817_621_638_184_776_455_097_235_505_439_875_278_487_750_500_686_811_735_203_166_972_760_966_316_204_727_367_333_691_044_372_506_377_867_023_708_865_915_970_051_278_206_578_388_387_904_050_702_464_054_346_622_915_191_986_464_436_407_208_755_333_978_938_836_771_923_129_737_123_650_078_043_795_228_628_186_886_770_773_504_430_063_910_722_193_575_378_561_125_431_578_117_217_036_387_035_897_322_451_450_471_200_840_969_793_659_455_261_090_869_209_154_141_175_062_483_238_176_800_183_895_460_207_647_682_023_614_358_926_127_837_892_166_390_573_059_509_384_182_608_400_225_875_906_563_281_562_776_783_382_378_840_673_180_732_106_462_361_530_790_431_385_135_900_494_068_496_226_445_976_235_646_685_206_213_329_443_077_364_586_561_338_032_172_829_889_710_344_892_478_038_827_818_830_652_299_705_036_420_833_167_039_127_761_954_012_883_134_879_076_038_009_526_137_906_539_677_277_558_674_248_082_745_184_167_873_377_586_027_491_710_083_803_396_739_910_688_277_095_495_026_438_647_923_136_904_941_511_324_580_479_232_866_877_458_551_974_968_474_687_987_995_789_986_142_669_849_491_281_912_171_247_813_453_740_930_656_894_003_908_288_802_910_371_559_208_442_546_691_828_823_630_657_779_875_353_840_963_419_553_036_186_058_139_332_661_643_403_346_423_792_266_060_059_673_733_958_416_588_787_920_598_985_717_151_943_361_263_682_353_475_731_589_382_904_709_914_737_355_960_510_471_119_721_676_996_297_211_249_387_245_873_588_537_104_277_923_448_809_752_663_780_893_593_464_568_150_780_646_534_224_208_496_389_950_823_987_404_992_744_337_157_466_940_505_023_995_579_231_190_326_631_043_047_534_297_843_805_208_998_557_791_431_545_552_099_346_436_003_268_200_204_334_697_870_283_842_377_261_763_120_152_848_750_623_088_833_259_731_764_140_702_851_242_874_111_051_446_609_960_175_995_894_705_818_817_583_063_983_372_018_229_841_785_937_503_349_643_633_123_658_514_793_743_472_928_948_565_493_793_758_088_365_399_535_461_634_273_037_330_424_209_054_834_183_109_653_089_870_608_645_751_615_415_376_262_306_754_644_222_658_366_682_670_132_936_540_634_742_756_385_424_554_196_967_804_819_460_835_109_790_554_198_649_687_497_242_921_710_131_369_354_704_436_915_321_723_376_570_870_575_296_157_208_556_892_266_881_358_872_945_051_829_052_744_379_600_531_674_070_794_655_682_745_883_609_189_672_990_019_526_523_320_354_438_897_841_269_263_894_052_864
```
